Location.description: The URL to the newly created instance.

401.description: This request requires user authentication, as configured by the server.

500.description: Something went wrong during the request; check out the logs on your server.

504.description: The request took too long to process, and the server timed it out.

200.description: The find all succeeded, and the results are available.

401.description: This request requires user authentication, as configured by the server.

500.description: Something went wrong during the request; check out the logs on your server.

504.description: The request took too long to process, and the server timed it out.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to fetch. The value must be greater than 0, and no greater than 1000.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip. The value must not be less than 0.

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: Constrains values for fields. The value should be encoded JSON.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: A dictionary of one or more fields specifying sorting of results. In general, you can sort based on any predefined field that you can query using the where operator, as well as on custom fields. The value should be encoded JSON.

parameters.name: sel
parameters.description: Selects which fields to return from the query. Others are excluded. The value should be encoded JSON.

parameters.name: unsel
parameters.description: Selects which fields to not return from the query. Others are included. The value should be encoded JSON.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Request page number starting from 1.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of results per page.
